entry.title: Teaching
entry.content: After some Git problems were sorted out and explained to me by the staff of the Scholars’ Lab, I can make updates to the site again. I have added some content to the Teaching page: the syllabus for my current writing course among other goodies. Enjoy!

entry.title: We're Live!
entry.content: The site is officially reborn and is now running on Octopress. In the coming days I will continue tinkering with the design and adding some content here and there, but the basic framework for the site is in place.
